name: Flash Color Palette Multi-use Cream Color Palette
about: What it is:An iconic, must-have palette for pro artists and enthusiasts featuring 12 boldly-pigmented cream shades for the face, lips and body..What Else You Need to Know:Unleash your creativity with this highly-blendable cream formula that effortlessly delivers showstopping color. Each shade can be used individually or mixed to create your dream shade or adjust the undertone of an existing product. This versatile palette is ideal for any level of artistry..This Palette Contains:Artistic Palette:- 12 x 0.21 oz/ 6 g Flash Color in 04 Gold, 02 Coral, 00 Turquoise, 25 Fuchsia, 13 Yellow, 23 Brown, 03 Silver, 10 White, 24 Red, 14 Bright Blue, 8 Leaf Green, 11 Black
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Start by using a small amount of product (a little goes a long way with this formula) and apply where desired..-Set with a setting powder such as Super Matte Loose Powder (sold separately)..-Finish with Mist and Fix Setting Spray (sold separately).

The product will smear and crease if you donu2019t set it with a translucent finishing or setting powder. Once you set, it is locked. The product has a smoothing effect as well.

reviews.review_title: Versatile and nice but doesn't stay on eyelids .

This really is an investment and itu2019s so pigmented a tiny amount goes a long way so itu2019ll last you forever. Sorry this sounds like an ad iu2019m just really happy i bought this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A makeup junkies dream!!!! Let your imagination run wild with this cream based makeup palette. There is no limit here... from lipstick, concealer, brow pomade, cream eyeshadow, blush, contour, plus, plus, plus... you get the point! There are some nice colours on their own but are obviously completely customizable plus you get the necessary primary shades, black and white to create any shade in the world, and even gold and silver. Nice formula and blends out very nicely. If you are a professional MUA or just love to have fun with makeup you will enjoy this tremendously!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It took me some adjusting as I'm new to anything other than powder makeup, but as soon as I got the hang of, I FELL IN LOVE! it's really creamy and doesn't feel super heavy on the skin. I have pretty oily skin and it does show through a bit but I found using a similar colored eyeshadow to set it helps a little. I've already abused mine quite a lot and will probably continue to purchase this as I run out it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i bought this last minute like i do for everything for a theatrical production that i was in charge of the cast's stage makeup for. with the flash shipping, it arrived the next day (crazy!) and the product held up in quality throughout all 3 hectic and vvv sweaty performances, and no touch-ups were needed, which is especially impressive since the cast required a LOT of detailing. if you're looking for a high quality, lightweight yet highly pigmented, and long lasting product; this cream color palette is the way to go lads. it is DEFINITELY worth the price (which is like,,, 12 24-packs of ramen).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first sephora purchase and it really opened the gateway for me to not only experiment with makeup but have fun and be creative with my face. Ultimately these grease paint like colours are super pigmented (a little goes a long way), really bendable, and easily mixable for any custom colour for any creative look. Perfect for drag to even custom everyday looks (lips, blush, eye shadow base). These colours are not budge proof unless you set them. Use a velour puff or beauty blender to essentially bake the product like you would a concealer. This will mute some of the vibrancy however, but if you want the colour to last all day it's the only way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I saw the neutral palette online it looked like my dream come true. I strongly prefer cream formulations for eye makeup, as they perform far better on mature skin (Iu2019m 40). No wrinkles for me yet, but the flesh around your eyes becomes more delicate as you age. Due to that and some oil control issues on my lids, I wonu2019t use most powder formulations. I was most excited to try the blue and green pots in this palette. Unfortunately, they were the most confusing. Unless I wanted to create a bold, avant-garde nighttime look, the blue and green have no use for me. They look very strange once applied. The other colors are lovely but I donu2019t need all those pink and pink-adjacent shades. Iu2019m giving it three stars because the formulation does seem excellent, though I imagine the packaging and the volume of product will cause dry-out over time. For $99, with no practical value for me personally, this had to be returned. Iu2019m interested in seeing the kind of looks others can pull off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Palette!! Got it as a last minute investment for Halloween. It helped me achieve multiple beautiful looks for my clients. The only reason I didnu2019t rate it 5 stars is because it arrived broken. I was so upset but I couldnu2019t return or exchange it at any store and exchanging online would of taken too long.  Other than that, itu2019s a great purchase. A little goes a LONG way and lasts! My client request a intense look for her bartending shift on Halloween night and she looked amazing for 6 hours behind the bar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been on my wish list for many years and I finally purchased it for Halloween. I used the colors to do Halloween skeleton looks for my husband and I this year and even my husband remarked on how comfortable the product was to wear. He was expecting the product to feel itchy and irritating. Not at all! We stayed in character the entire night without once needing to fuss with the application. Great job MUFE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i would recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Must Have For All Professional Artists
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This palette always saves the day because the cream colors are pigmented, easily mixed, and effortlessly applied. Iu2019ve used it for face paint as well as color correcting! The opportunities are endless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this palette. It is amazing, specially for halloween time! The ample of looks you can create with the flash palette is beyond amazing. It's so creamy that the it blends so seamlessly! Definitely worth the price and the product!
as a makeup artist who does more conceptual looks this did wonders

I really like Makeup Forever's brand and appreciate that their colors are very saturated. that's why I had such high hopes for this cream color palette. I got into my head that I wanted to use cream blush and cream eyeshadows from now on. this pallet proved that was not a good idea for me. before you decide you want to use cream formulation for your makeup, I recommend you really experiment with it before dropping $99 on something like this. this is really not for your average makeup user.

I had such high hopes for this iconic palette. The color selections and the light compact case make it extremely alluring and practical for any make up junkie, from novice to pro. But unfortunately the quality doesn't match to its bolstering $99 price tag. At a first glance and swatch the color payoff is vivid and pigmented but the formula is really greasy and doesn't stay put. I've used lipsticks on my eyes and cheeks that have had a better blending and lasting power. I really can't see how this has gotten several raving reviews, and I urge MUFE to make the formula matte rather than creamy. Really disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Must have for special FX artists
reviews.review_text: Never tried any grease paint that works the way this one does. If you mix it with thinner, it'll go such a long way and it will look seamless on the skin. And it's very user friendly. Love it!

reviews.review_title: a must for those who want colour options :)
reviews.review_text: I'm a makeup junkie and a Harajuku girl that is active in cosplay so this set fits right in with all my routines. My biggest piece of advice is to use sparingly (less is more!) and set everything with a good, high performance powder.

Yes this product is expensive however if you have it its worth the splurge. The colors are amazing! this was my go to product for Halloween. However a setting powder is a MUST!!! I used Morphe PICASSO PALETTE to set it since the colors are very similar. I give it 4 stars because i wish it would set better but like I said a setting powder will do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this once in a class at Makeup Forever and could not help but fall in love. I got the artistic palette because I knew that I could mix the colors into more neutral shades. I really love this palette but since it's so creamy and easy to blend it needs to be set with powder. I use this for SFX all the time. It's amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great if you are looking to do a dramatic look for Halloween. I highly recommend using a setting powder though because it does not set too well. It's almost like it stays wet on your skin so the setting powder is a must.

I HATE The flash pallets. Great colors but they don't set!!! I it won't last very long and if you accidentally touch it it will move. It gets everywhere and it's just the worst product I've ever used. Makes me sad Bc other makeup forever stuff is amazing!

recently just bought the Neutral palette. i use it for my sfx makeup. it's a great palette for that use, especially for details. i plan on getting the artistic one soon. wish i had these palettes last year.

I bought this about a year ago and love how pigmented it is. This really lets you create colours that you may not have yet in your kit and they stay as a base for a decent amount of time. THIS IS NOT A LIPSTICK PALETTE! This is way to creamy to be a lipstick because they do not set, they are grease paints. However, I honestly don't use this as much as I thought I would've. If I could go back I'd skip it because it really isn't worth >100, maybe 60
This is a must have for anyone serious about creating a plethora of looks. And it functions quite nicely for those foundation samples that come in the wrong color!

I love my flash palette! This palette is so versatile and its colors are extra pigmented! You do have to set it, otherwise it will smudge or melt! I've used it all over the face and as lip/eye liners!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a person who considers herself a pretty good makeup junkie and artist. I tried my best with these and they literally melted off my face within 4 hours. Even with a primer on my face and lids. I HATED this product. For those of you who can use this Id like to know how you made it stay.  Maybe for a photo shoot, where your going to wipe it off immediately but not for every day wear. Just no.
This palette is for artists only and I love it's unlimited creative prospects!

I'm a pro makeup artist and I'm so glad o finally bought this. I can use it for so many things and not have to spend extra money. Even though it's $99 it's actually good if you are on a budget because it's so versatile. You have to set the colors or they will run. That seems to be the main complaint on this board. But I love it!

reviews.review_title: MUST HAVE for every pro kit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a part-time professional makeup artist and this kit is a must especially when doing an editorial shoot.  The colors are super-pigmented, easy to blend, and lasts.  I don't know why it took me so long to purchase one.  The price is justifies its quality.

This is considered a must have among makeup artists. It has a lot of uses and a consistency difficult to find in other products. I'm leaving 3 stars because there is NO room for error. And God help you if you're the one who has to get this off your skin, It's nearly impossible.
Love this so much you can do with this!!! Endless possibilities

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this when I signed up online to get my beauty card I initially wondered why i would need such an expensive kit but after using it couple times I'm so in love with it especially not is Carnival season I recently purchased another to create more carnival make up looks. Thank you !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As for color payoff, what you see is what you get. Amazing and easy to apply. Smooth and creamy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this a lot for face and body art. A little definitely goes a long way and has a great color selection. I bought the Artistic one and it is nicely pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this pallet for beauty makeup as well as special effects makeup and it works beautifully! They are grease paints so you do need to set them if you are using it for special effects makeup or using it as a blush or mixing foundation colors. Perfect item for your pro kit or just a makeup addict. Very pigmented, a little goes a long way. Will last you a long time. Totally worth the mullah$$ Love this!

reviews.review_title: never really dries, but vibrant color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So i used the white out of this for halloween. I like that the more or less you put on you can control the intensity. i used a spay on setting spray over it instead of powder or anything. it worked nicely. it didn't crack. it also o didn't fully dry. its the best option i have found so far for costume makeup.

reviews.review_title: A MUST HAVE IN ALL KITS!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have item in everyone's makeup kit and pro kit...if you ever are in a bind and are missing a color, lip color, need to darken or lighten a foundation you can use the shades in this kit to do all that!!! You can formulate your own lipsticks, make a foundation out of the white and peach and brown colors. The possibilities are endless!! I LOVE THIS! And Will always have it on hand in my kit. Also perfect for Special FX projects!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this set. The colors are truly pigmented and they can create amazing color stories. The peach tone makes an excellent beard cover. I honestly will keep stocking up on this palette, but a little goes a long way.  My best advice would be to make sure you set this with a translucent powder. In addition to that I have found if the colors start to become muddy you can use your base or in my case high light foundation color to add more luminosity and sharpen the tones.
I got this to do a day of the dead makeup and one light touch- it's smeared and off. Total waste of $

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are super creamy, like SUPER CREAMY. It needs a base with a translucent shadow or a base shadow already on the lid, or else it will smudge! I love using the color case with the flashier colors, as it works well with pop art looks. Its so versatile, but I did notice you have to pile on the product to get a really strong bold color as well. Overall, I really like the different things I can do with this product, but theres just so much prepping before applying that must be done.

reviews.review_title: Compulsory for anyone looking to do creative looks
reviews.review_text: Is it user friendly? The creamy consistency makes it a dream to work with. It can be sheered out to add just a hint of colour or layered for bold opaque look. You can apply this product with ease using any tool you should desire.  One huge downfall of the product is it does not translate well on eyes. It needs dry surfaces like the cheeks and lips to adhere to to stay in place. On the eyes, it creases and slips. I have tried setting it with powder, it just becomes cakey. I have tried priming the skin before application, it makes no difference and I have also tried mixing a gel mattifyer to the product in the hopes that it would soak up a bit of the moisture, it did not. The only thing I have not utilixed to rememdy the issue, is a sealant. If anyone has done so, please share your experiences below.  What makes this product stand out above the rest? This product is versatile; it can be used anywhere on the face and body and acts as a great base for making dull eyeshadows seem lively! The wide array of colours are perfect to add to a kit for professional use and work well in beauty, creative, fantasy and special FX looks.  The Nitty Gritty? As mentioned above, this product is not ideal for use on the eyelids. This item aslo has a hefty tag price retailing for $99. It was retailing at sephora.com for $110 CDN and since has been reduced to $99. However, it is still very expensive.  Final Summation:A must have for anyone who is serious about makeup. You will be pleased at the colour options and how vivid they turns up on film/digital format. With that said, don't however expect much in terms of wear on the lids.
I love this artistic palette! Beautiful colors it's pricey but I bought it with my 15% off so I saved a little but don't regret it!!!!

reviews.review_title: Love it. It's a MUA must have.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this palette. If you know how to use it, you can use it to tint lipsticks to the perfect color, use it as a color corrector, tint foundations, make foundation, contour, do your eyebrows. It's great and I haven't even given it a Halloween test drive yet.

reviews.review_title: awesome if you know color theory
reviews.review_text: I love this product and it has saved me so many times when I needed to use a corrector. You can use this to make foundation of you wanted to, and if you know how to properly find the colors to match your skin. I've used it to make gorgeous cheek and lip colors as well. It's become a staple in my kit. I wouldn't recommend this to a consumer who just wanted to use it for lips or eyes. It's definitely way more versatile than that and not worth you spending that's how if you don't plan to use it for what it's intended. Learn proper color theory and this product will become one of your favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a palette for someone who wants to do their makeup quickly or in one step. These creams are amazing if you know how to use them, but they do require work. They creased on my eyes even with a primer, but I've been able to use them for contouring, blush, and highlighting with a flawless finish. The pink/purple colors are beautiful blushes and lipsticks. One pet peeve is that the palette doesn't latch closed. It just has a lid you replace, which can come loose in a makeup bag.

I bought the Artistic palette because I wanted to try some bolder colors and I absolutely love it! I love that this can be used as eye shadow, blush and lipstick. The product is very creamy and glides on easily. I used the coral on my lips and was pleasantly surprised at how pigmented it came out with just one coat. Definitely would recommend this and the neutral palette is on my Wish List.

I own both palettes. I was a bit weary of purchasing due to the price so I watched some YouTube videos to get the feel of what I use these palettes for. After I was shown how to mix the colors to make foundations, blushes, contour colors, and lipsticks I knew I had to have them. I must say I get more use out of the brighter flash palette. I mix the colors for my foundation and contour while the neutral palette I use more for lipsticks and blushes. You really can achieve a full face look. With that said be sure to use something to set the make up. It's a cream base and will come off if you're not careful. All in all they are worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im a makeup junkie, I loooooove makeup. And if I love something enough I will go great lengths to make it work for me. I first bought this a few years ago when I was a makeup newbie, I couldn't figure out what to do with it so I ended up returning it. Now I'm doing theatrical makeup, photoshoots, cosplays and whatnot so I figured this stuff would be perfect... Nope. It just does not work for me, I've tried primers, powders, literally everything to try and set this stuff but it slips and slides everywhere on my skin and doesn't even last an hour. Maybe it just me and my weird :(

reviews.review_title: Neutral Flash Palette great for contouring
reviews.review_text: Neutral brown and the cream colour are great for contouring on my medium warm toned skin. The other shades are great as cream blushes, a little drying for lips.

reviews.review_title: Great Brand but not this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love MF foundations but this no. Returned it. Even with shadow primer this did not last. The colors are good to layer but for my fair skin I only used a few of them.
I have accomplished just about everything with this palette! So worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Excellent blendability and color selection. I love using these to adjust foundations + theatrical makeup. Great price for the amount of colors, and you can recreate pretty much any color you need.
Perfect for Halloween! If you are big into special effects then this palette is a must have. It's also great for a base for eye shadow. A lot goes a long way so definitely worth the investment.

reviews.review_title: for the artistic 12 flash color case
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT!! although I still need to play a lot more with it.. I find it extremely useful! I bought it a little while ago and recently I had been looking for great cream blush that was rich and bendable, After two unsuccessful buys I remembered that I had this! I used it and loved it and returned my two other blushes! I customized the blush to my taste. It's long lasting, I can make it as rich or as light or bright or as dark as I want. I read that it can be used to make your foundation, your eyeliners, lipsticks and eyeshadows. Although I'm not sure about using it just as shadows, maybe as a base, because in my opinion they might just crease on their own. They are super creamy!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, colours are very opaque. This is great for costume-make up. I wish you can buy individual colours just because I use the white colour a lot. You can mix up the colours as well to get the perfect shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great for dressing up or costume make-up. I wish they had more of the popular colors, like black and white, but every color is usable for looks such as robot face, clowns, scars, mermaid scales, and so much more!
I am so happy with this purchase. I originally bought it for halloween, but I can definitely use it for other occasions! Love the creaminess and long lasting wear as well, definitely a recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just bought this for Halloween. It has beautiful colour payoff with just one swipe. It is grwat for painting on scars and details, and the fuchsia colour is great for brightening up lipstick on darker pigmented lips. Expensive? Yes. Worth it? Absolutely
where should i get a makeup forever foundation pallete?
I love this hi end palette !!!its a must have for all of the cosmetic Diva Junkies out there!!' It's totally worth it !!!

I find myself only using one or two colors from this but I have to say I absolutely adore it! I just wish I could use it to it's full potential. Most pigmented cream based item probably in the whole makeup world
Where has this been my whole life !?????u2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fI'm a traveling makeup artist ! This is Essential for your kit ! Shame on you if you don't add this little piece of heaven
This is perfect for mixing colors to create an eyeshadow you may not have. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this wil be better for fall and winter use. Just tried it and love it. Need a color wheel to come with it though I found it hard to get a color for makeup, but I did it and used only the palate and mascara.will be wonderful for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is super versatile and one of my favorite items in my kit. Not for ideal everyday, personal use (don't get me wrong you could but there are much easier products to work with). A must for any pro kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is beyond words! This was actually my first ever Sephora purchase and wow did i make a good choice! The colors are crazy pigmented and the amount you get is fantastic. I've had it since October of 2013 its now June of 2014 and its still looks full even with moderate to heavy usage. I feel like even though the cost may be at the pro end you don't need to be a pro to justify the purchase. It's super easy to work with and anyone that enjoys just creating new looks on the fly will love this palette. You can do so many things with the colors even create almost full looks out of them. This palette is amazing and i know if i ever run out of it i'll definitely buy another.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette will be the last product you buy for your lips and cheeks, and you can use it to play up you're eyes as well. Great great value.

Seriously the best thing ever!! I've only used it so far for eyes and lips & it has Super pigment, great blending, and feels really light. Always gives the perfect color you want. Definitely a purchase well worth the cost :)

I honestly don't normally wear a lot of make up so I am probably the furthest thing from a make up artist. However, I rather fancy eye liners and and the occasional lipstick so when I saw this, it seemed like a great deal for all of the colors that are included, especially since any combination of these would cost more than double what you're paying here. I've had my color case for almost two years, and I've barely made a dent in it because a little goes a long way and the colors tend to last all day/night.

reviews.review_title: Pricey but great multi tasking palette
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very good color palette, One stop shop for eyes, cheeks and lips. They give you alot of product. However I prefer the original Kroylan version they knocked off for better price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how versatile this palette is, I use it almost every day to make a dark scarlet lipstick with the red and black colours, it's drying on the lips so i would suggest using a balm or something first but the colour lasts FOREVER the colour selection is beautiful. I use it for blusher as well and i can make any sort of look with the colours. It's a grease paint makeup set so if used as eyes shadow it doesn't really dry and will crease like crazy if you don't set it. Would definitely recommend for anyone who wants a selection of great quality colours but doesn't want to pay for all the individual ones because you can mix these colours to make custom colours.

Was told that this was such a great product and it's everything I thought it would be! I use it everyday and for everything! Colors are pigmented and I love mixing them to make even greater looks! Totally worth the cost!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so happy I bought this palette! The colors are super vibrant and highly pigmented. You can use these colors for anything; eyeshadow, liner, blush, foundation. Definitely worth the investment if you are serious about makeup or a makeup artist.

I am currently using the 12 flash color case under my shadows daily. I have a hooded, oily lids that are prone to creasing. It works amazingly, no creasing, makes every eye shadow look brighter. The only negative thing about it is I felt it is a lot smaller in person, than it seems in the photos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this!!!! It is one of the most amazing multi-purpose palettes out there. I love that you can use these colours on their own, and mix them as well to make custom colours. Love this so much, and a little goes a long way, so this will last forever!  In my pictures, I used the light blue on the lower lash line and the dark blue on the upper lash line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seriously one of the coolest palettes I have bought. No more trying to find the perfect color when I can make my own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 - would recommend~~~

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is amazing! For anyone hoping to become an MUA, or anyone who is one, this is a fantastic investment. There are so many uses for the different colours, and you get so much product that it lasts for ages. Don't let the price put you off, because this is seriously impressive.

People thinking this is a cream eyeshadow palette are sadly misinformed. This is one of the best grease makeup palettes I've used and the colors stay vibrant for a looooong time when properly set. The colors themselves are great, some hard to find. The product itself blends great. My only problem with this palette is there's no purple! I would love a copper metallic color as well, but this palette is a good investment and will last for awhile (had mine for three years so far).

Everyone that's written a bad review on this palette obviously doesn't know how to use it , it is not a cream eyeshadow that will stay on all day , is a mainly use to for base and ppl tht say is not enough product is also wrong I've been having mine for almost 3 years n I still have tons of product left a little goes a long way is really creamy n the best base palette out there , I recommend to any PRO artist , is a great investment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a Christmas present and I haven't put it down since then! I use it every single day whether it be as a base for my eyeshadow, as a blush, or as lipstick. I filmed a video on my YouTube channel, so check that out if you want my full in depth review on it!
I think this is the best palette EVER

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is an advanced color palette that you can create any combo of things from beauty makeup to special effects makeup. I've been a pro makeup artist for over 13 years and this palette advanced my makeup skills since the possibilities this kit offers is limitless. I've talked to several celeb artists that use this kit as well. It's fun to let your creativity soar too!

I've been eyeing this palette for 2 years and debating because of the high price tag, turns out I got this as a gift:) played around with it several times and I must say I love this palette..I reach for this palette each and everytime I do my makeup.. There's endless possibilitys with this palette.. When used correctly it does stay put.. And lasts long.. These colors are very pigmented.. Very little goes a long way... You can use this palette for almost everything..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is great. Brown+Foundation=Contour. Coral+Foundation=Salmon color Green+Foundation=Cancel redness on your face Black+Brown+White+Clear Mascara=Brow tint You can mix the pinks/reds/corals/yellows and mix a bit with your foundation to get a natural cheek color. The red is the hardest texture. I feel like it's grainy sometimes but that's just comparing to others since they are very creamy. The reds and the pinks tend to stain. So don't put it directly on your eyes. (you are not suppose to it says in the back) but if you really want to put some base on your eyes before you tint them with red color haha. I just like being creative with these so if you like mixing up and stuff get it. You might wanna get spatula and palette when you are working with it. back of your hand would get too messy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not going to lie, I have put off buying this for so long because of the price. Being a pro MUA, I had no choice but to pruchase it on my last trip to sephora. And I have only one thing to say: Absolutly no regret.  I got it on the 20% off weekend to make myself feel less sad of spending so much on ONE product.  But I'm not disappointed in any way from the Flash palette. It really stands up to my expectations.  If I would have known, I would have bought it earlier on!

I bought this palette thinking that since it's professional make-up it will stay put and last all night long no matter what. Well it definitetly did NOT. The off chance that I touched my face at all, even ever so lightly it would come off. I was so sad. You do get a lot of product, but it just isn't worth it if it doesn't stay.
Must have for pro or novice. If you love color this palette is for you. Primer is a must for eyeshadow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sadly, colors don't last and the palette size makes it difficult to reach the colors with ur brushes...

This palette has so many different uses and the pigmentation is great. I've used mine for both Halloween makeup and to create custom lip colors. It's a bit pricey but definitely worth it. The colors are easy to work with and blend. Love it!

I was real hesitant about purchasing this product last Halloween. But I bought it anyway. I'm not a professional makeup artist at all. It's an awesome tool for Halloween costume makeup cause you can mix and match it. I'm really glad I got it, cause I was really proud about the makeup I did this year for Halloween! :D

Don't waste your money if you're only going to use this for costumey makeup. This palette goes far above and beyond that. I use this palette to duplicate hard to find lipsticks and create custom foundations for clients. It's completely easy to do and you definitely get your money's worth. This palette alone an replace over half your kit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has so many uses!! was hesitant because of the cost, but it is so worth it!! You can make customized lip colors use it as eye shadow base, create Halloween looks, darken or lighten foundation shades, the list goes on!! A great investment!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best purchases I have ever made. Worth every penny and a little bit goes a long way. Quality item!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I bought this I wasn't sure how often I would actually use it. Once I started playing around with it, I figured out I can use it for anything! I have lightened foundations that I own that are a little too dark for my skin. A little bit goes a very long way! I would definitely recommend this palette for anyone that wants to get creative, or mix some of their own colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this palette! All of the colours are highly pigmented, and they last all day long on my skin. I've been using the black shade as my daily eye liner, and it doesn't flake or fade at all. This item is quite pricey, but you can use these shades as blushes, liners, cream shadows, lipsticks, etc.!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this palette! The colors are amazing and really add intensity to any look. My ONLY complaints are that there is no purple and that they crease very easily on the eyelids. Other than that, it's perfect!!! one of the best investments I've ever made!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited when I finally received this, but was disappointed soon after. I applied the one color as a base for my look which I normally do with cream shadows. My make up looked beautiful when I put it on, but within two hours, my make up was a mess! I do have oily skin and have had a problem with creasing. I have since solved that problem with the use of eye primer and quality eye shadow. I tried two different brands of primer to rule out issues with this color case, but still have the same end result. I will not give up yet (due to cost of product) and will continue to try different things to make it last longer.

this works well as a eyeshadow base. The color lasts thruout an entire workshift and a cardio ride. So don't worry about your night out dancing because this is one palette you don't want to be without. The fushia and coral are beautiful on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product and I feel like it will let a long time. Powdering is absolutely necessary, but the colors are beautiful.

This palette is wonderful, each color is super pigmented, easily blendable and very versatile. Don't let the brightness of the colors worry you - they are all very useful. The only downside is that other make up lovers seem to realize how amazing this is so some stores sell out frequently, I know that it took me quite a few months to find it in store - I had wanted to see it in person before I bought it, trust me its totally worth buying!
This product is very versitile it helps me a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is as great as I'd hoped. Wonderful texture, great blendability. The only bummer was that it was advertised as usable on all skin surfaces, when reading the script it has restrictions on certain colors being near eyes or mouth, so...slightly limiting, but not enough to discourage the purchasing of it.

I was hesitant on getting this for nearly two years, primarily due to the cost. Finally, thanks to a few bday gift cards I was able to justify the purchase. I am not a professional makeup artist, but an artist who loves makeup as much as paint and clay. This palette is awesome! So far I've only used it for daily cheeks, lips and tone corrections, but I can't wait for some full costume makeups. Worth it if you have some artistic skills to use the product - otherwise I could see spending the money on some other items.
Love the color selection and how it applies but a little bit of sweat and this stuff creases like crazy. I had to return!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are very creamy and i think verge on theatre makeup. So i believe you have to be very skilled / experienced to get good use out of this. For $100 you'd be better off buying something else if you're not PRO.

This was the best decision I ever made ! At first I was skeptical on paying $99 for a palette ? But then I did the math it I bought each separate it would be way more $ ... So I bought it and then came to find out you can use it for a million things and in super happy with it!!! It's totally worth it!! I recommended it 100%!

reviews.review_title: It's great but there is a dupe!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Kryolan Aquacolor 12 is a really good dupe for this, and at half the price. You can do anything with a palette like this but just realize that there is a whole world of professional, mixable cream colors that makeup artists use for everything from the kind of makeup you saw in Avatar to customizing lip colors. The MUFE palette is not the only option, although it is a good one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: great value! 220$ value for 95$ WHATTTT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The only good thing about it is when I put it as a blush. On the lips it drys the lips really fast and crisp the lips. Plus, it tastes really bad! On the eye, it's worst: it crease a lot. i tried to but a primer, a powder, to mix it with something else and nothing worked.  And for the blush, it works good, yes, but unless pink, red and pink/orange, who wants blue and green blush?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I waited forever on this and finally bought it. As a lipstick, it stays all day hands down! As a blush, it works like a cream blush, not good or bad, but it does the job. As eye make-up, it creases horribly. I have tried with a primer, without primer, with powder on top, eyeshadow on top, mixing with other items, etc.... No matter what, this creases every time. When you first put it on, it looks marvelous, but that is the only time it looks good. If anyone knows how to keep it from creasing on the eyes, would love to hear it. But overall, I like it though and am happy with it.
This product can be used for face painting, lipstick, eyeshadow, blush, and eyeliner. Love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this palette hesitantly because of the price and because of the colors. However, the colors are great since you can mix them up and make new ones. I have only used the colors on my lips since I have heard that the colors crease as eyeshadows. Since I got this palette I have not bought any new lipsticks, stains and glosses. I just blend the colors to obtain the color I want on my lips. I have also used this palette on my cheeks, you can make a nice cream blush with the pinks and white, a bronzer with the pinks and brown, contour. This palette is literally saving me more money in the long run. a Definite MUST buy for any make up artist or junkie. :)

This palette is Amazing!! I've used this palette for so many looks. It's my best friend. Definitely a must have. YES the price is a bit crazy and it looks like the pallets only has a little bit of product.....BUT a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So useful! It's multi-purpose... but some colors are not to be used in certain areas as you read the back of the label. I love the creamy consistency and the colors are so long lasting on my face. Love it! Well worth the money.

You have to use the tiniest amount if you use it as an eyeshadow. The colors blend nicely with each other and it's great if you want to mix your own blush colors. They're all very matte except for the gold and silver which I pat on in the middle of my lips and make every lipstick/gloss look great. I always get compliments but I never tell anyone my secret. The colors you see is what you get I just wish it didn't crease so much because I bought it mostly as eyeshadow bases. I find that I have to put shadow on top as soon as I smooth it on or it'll crease even when I blink. Still happy I finally bought it though...for 20% off

This is an incredible palette - especially great for traveling since you can use for eyes, cheeks,lips -- mix colors AND it is not liquid!! Lasts forever (no pun intended) -- I highly recommend, very creamy and blendable -- also fantastic for people in theatre !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this on impulse after I saw that it was marked down to $99 instead of $216. I saw a YouTube review by a pro MUA and decided I needed it in my kit. Man, was I wrong! It is not as pigmented as I thought it would be, nor was it as great as I was led to believe. It creases like crazy and no matter how long I wait for it to dry on my lids, it doesn't. even with shadows on top, it still creases, and makes the shadows that normally don't creas, crease! If I were in the US, I would have returned this, but since shipping it back from Australia is expensive, I'll just have to figure out a way to use it...Not happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is so small that I felt a Lilliputian! The quality is too heavy and difficult to apply with the brush.

reviews.review_title: Love it, but not for me
reviews.review_text: These colors are beautiful and can be used to create an infinity of combinations. The only reason I ended up returning it is because even with make up remover the colors stayed in my skin for more than the desired time.

This is a great product. I bought it so that I could use it for all of the Halloween makeup I have to do for my friends and family. It works great and the colors are perfect. They're very highly pigmented and last forever. I would highly recommend this to anybody. The only drawback is the price, but the product warrants it if you are serious about make up and/or Halloween.

very versatile, i love the brown and white used for contouring. I bring this palette with me everywhere. I bought a spatula to pick up the colors and mix the white, yellow and red to create a dewy orange hue for a nice blush. This palette will last very long, and stays on all day. The only problem is my skin gets sensitive, and sometimes i start having little bumps on where I put the makeup, but it goes away. Overally, I love the creamy texture and blendable-ness of this make-up.

This palette has very amazing colors. I can't resist to buy it. It took me awhile to make decision cuz of the price but I ended up purchased it.  I recommend this palette for pro make up artist or those who love to challenge new experience. It's nice but not a must have. If you're type of wearing the same make up color everyday....natural looking, brown, nude, sheer looking....it isn't your soulmate.  Good size, versatile, high pigment and quality.

The first time I saw this palette I admittedy didn't like it. The colors seemed so bright that they would be hard to use. As I read reviews on it I discovered they gave you these particular colors so that you can make ANY color you desire. This naturally piqued my interest so i decided to watch some youtube videos on it and study the color wheel a bit. After much research, I finally bought it. I have not regretted it once. This is one of those products i use everyday because it can be used for so many things. I love to mix custom eyeshadows with it. I have made several lovely purples from this palette as wel as beautiful blushes. When you use it as a blush, make sure you apply the color/mix very sheerly and blend well. If you do this it will look like a very naural stain on your cheeks ans will last all day. As for eveshadows, it will crease if you dont use it properly. When i apply it on my eyes, I make sure not to use an oily moisturizer or eyecream and I also apply UD Primer Potion. Then I apply my desired color very sheerly and blend it well before setting it with a powder. You can use a corresponding color of powder shadow or a translucent setting powder. When I do this it creases very very little or not at all. I would also like to say that the warnings about what colors can/cant be used on eyes or lips is only on there for the U.S. customers. I have sensative skin and I do not heed these warnings and I have had no problems at all. I have also used this palette as facepaint for a ball game i went to. I set it with powder and it lasted all day without smearing! This is a truly fantastic product that you can use for anything. If you are thinking of getting it, I would reccomend that you really do your research on it and make sure you play around with it alot at first. Once yu get the hang of it you can make any color for anyhing :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I salivated over this palette for about a year before I finally broke down and bought it. When I did, I found that it did for me what it did for all the others who gave it a bad review: it creased like crazy. I couldn't even get it to dry without creasing. I tried everything: different primers, no primer, layering on top of shadows, powdering it down. I eventually had to admit defeat and return it. It was lovely, but it just wouldn't stay on, and when I applied the shimmery colors, the glitter fallout was ridiculous.  One note: I do have oily lids, so some products just don't work for me. The texture of this product is super-slick, not as creamy as I was led to think, and that may be the issue. I do have many other MUFE products, and I have no problems with any of those. In fact, they're some of my favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best palette ever... Everyone should get one. professional or personal.

well all the colors last all day alone or with any shadow & i mean any shadow... this is about 100 usd. you will be able to prep eye lids for even tone or add highlight to cheeks or shade, blends well with liquid foundation use it on lips for an amazing skin tone pales anyone who puts make up on will have many uses .... a must buy!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It looks like a few other people had a similar experience, but this stuff creased really horribly on me. It may be that I have naturally oily skin, but either way, this didn't work out, and I have to return it...which is sad because it sat in my shopping basket for an eternity before I broke down and bought it.

reviews.review_title: Just Go Ahead And Buy It!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yeah it's expensive but look at those colors! I used the blue the other day as a top and bottom eyeliner (associates explained the warning had to be placed on there because of where it was made but it can still be used anywhere). I felt FABULOUS in that blue. Feeling that it may smudge I placed blue eyeshadow powder over it to set and it went all day. Check out this story...I even had a crying spell on the way home - you know how we girls are sometimes...STILL had to use make-up remover to take it off. It's fun and makes you feel young - matches anything. You are worth the price, ladies!

I personally didn't like it. I bought this palette for artistry purposes. In the description it says it can be used on eyes, cheeks, and lips unfortunately on the back packaging some of the colors I either couldn't use on the eyes or i couldn't use on the lips. Also, some of the colors, no matter what I tried (especially the metallic), kept creasing. These colors weren't as long lasting as I would have liked. So I returned it because I had no use for it. I wouldn't have minded paying for this product if was truly worth it.

reviews.review_title: You'll never need another product again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is AMAZING. You can create ANYTHING with the colors, even foundation that matches your exact skin tone! You can create almost any color imaginable by blending. Go and get yourself a color wheel and just experiment. You can create custom eye shadow, lip color, blush, eyeliner, eyebrow color, and did I mention foundation?!?? I mixed yellow, green, orange, and a touch of brown. It's insane. Some reviewers clearly have no idea you can do this as they keep saying these colors don't work on them etc. They work on everybody!!! Learn how to blend! And you need so little product that the palette is a steal for $99. It will last forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is one of my ultimate go to palettes when it comes to anything from everyday looks to dramatic evening looks. The colour payoff is wonderful -- but be care. A little goes a VERY long way. Dab too much and you'll end up with a thick block of bright colour on wherever you dabbed it on your face.  The brown and white are great for contouring (used VERY sheerly), and the pink, red and coral are great for the cheeks. Obviously this palette can be used for the eyes as well, but that's just one of the many things this palette can do. I use the colours (such as black, blue, green, silver and gold) as primer sometimes -- If my base colour is green for example, I'll use a touch of green to really bring out that colour.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with this palette. The only thing I would say is a downside to this, is the smell -- it DOES smell a little strong. Also, if you have greasy skin this might not be the best for you, as it could make your skin even more greasy.

reviews.review_title: Great for everyday and great for stage!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this frequently in theater and in my everyday life. All the colors are VIVID, though it is very important to set this with a powder! This is such a good buy, and a very versatile palette that you will be able to use for a long time.

super high pigment, build-able color, & great staying power....this is great for any fun eye look...great for color brows too, put over & under shadows for super song color...i have oily skin super i did need a stronger primer to not have creasing but if i layered shadow between it helped up gore hours!!!
amazing product well worth the price there are so many uses the only thing i will say is it does have mineral oil as the first ingredient

I have had this Flash palette for some time, until recently I decided to use it, primarily as eye base for some colorful eyeshadows, I have to say its fanastic!! The eyeshadows adhere much better, lasts all day and no creasing. I know this can be used for other makeup purposes but for now, its great for eye makeup.
Definitely need a base. You can create virtually anything with this; mix it with everything, use it as a base. I will never run out since there's so much product.
This was terrible the colors were nice online but not in real life. And it was sticky and not that pigmented.

I have been doing a lot of research on this product and I finally went into Sephora today to purchase it. I was very hesitant at first because of the price...but after taking it home and experimenting with it, it was worth every penny! One reason why I was iffy about the purchase was because of the color warnings (and I wanted to get the most out of the palette as I could) but I came to find out that the USA is a lot more strict when it comes to pigments and what the recommended uses are. I used all of the colors on all the parts of my face...I didn't break out...I didn't go blind...I didn't explode or catch on fire...so it's really use at you own risk (but our big brother government requires the warning)...Also I have heard complaints that the color is not pigmented and that you don't get a lot of product..#1 a little product goes a looonnnggg way...and I mean just a tiny tiny bit..even smaller than a pea especially for the lips #2 If you blend out ANY product it will become sheer.. you can always just layer the product until you get the desired amount of opacity. Bottom line.. I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!

I bought this pallet because i had heard so much about how great it was because of the pure pigments . All the reviews I read are true, the payoff is excellent and this pallet is universal it can be used for everything,

At this point I still feel as if this was overpriced. The colors that I want to use on my eyes, it says that I can't. :( It is really creamy so you must have a base or powder to set it. The pigment is great. i just hope that I find more uses for these colors.

great creamy product...i use it as contour, blush, lip liner and lip color every single day. Very mixable, very pigmented (little goes a long way), long wear, does NOT cake or dry out ( I mix colors on a palette not my hand, and the product stays creamy on the palette until I wash it off. So I can work from the palette instead of using more from the pan) A LOT of product... the only two I see running out in maybe 2 years is black and brown .worth every penny.

I wanted this palette so bad, i put it to the back burner for a while and I'm glad I did because I picked this up during the Family and Friends sale. So I got a better deal on it then what it already is. But even with it being 95 I would still get it at that price because it's totally worth it. I love playing with different colors and the Unlimited colors I can come up using this palette. It does crease if used on its own, but I do put it over UD primer and set it with the MUFE HD powder and that works for me, it last all day long. Love it. I do not recomend using it on the lips as it does make the lips a bit dry, but you can use it as a lipstain and put gloss over it Only on clean and bare lips.

...This pallet is overrated and overpriced. The colors ARE NOT very pigmented, and it's so creamy to the point where it creases. It is NOT worth $95 dollars, especially since there are only 12 colors. I returned the one I bought.
Its a wonderful product its so pigmented, creamy, blend-able,. I even used it for Halloween and it didn't crease or smear ..its a great investment.

I looked at the reviews that other people had posted about this product, and I figured it was worth it. It is very greasy and doesn't dry when it goes onto your face. Also it creases very easily. I like the color choices, they are very pigmented, however with it being greasy and creasing it may not be worth the cost.

In this Make Up For Ever 12 Flash Color Case; itu2019s a really nice set and the colors are nice, too. Love ever fact of it but it just creases too much. I had to use other eye shadows to help the creasing. However, the color changes; therefore, it is not really worth it. I donu2019t know why everyone likes it so much when it doesnu2019t even work well alone.

I have been eyeing thing foreverrrr. I couldn't decide if I really wanted to spend so much on one product. I finally splurged and was a little skeptical even when it did arrive. It was smaller than I expected but I swatched all the colors and did a couple looks and WOW. I am so glad I have it and will be keeping it. The colors are intense, creamy, long lasting. They make beautiful bases on the eyes or shadows alone. I am truely impressed with the array of colors and the quality. A++++

I got this for my birthday the other day and I am absolutely in love with this product! :) So far I have used it on my eyes and lips. I love creating custom lip colors too! My only draw back is that Im gonna need to play with this product some more before I become a master of it. I am an upcoming young makeup artist, and I think this is a great palette to have whether you are a makeup artist or not and just love makeup! I would definitely recommend this to a friend!
Blends really well, just make sure you get the HD Powder to set in.

This kit is sooooo fantastic. It precedes the Aqua Creams (note to MUFE--make a palette of the Aqua Creams, puh-leeze!!) and the pigments can be almost too slick when applied heavily--IF you don't set it right. I always used the MUFE primer, then use the pigment colors, then set with Hi-Def powder (I have 1 Kabuki brush that I ONLY use with these pigments, and another for everyday makeup), and then spray Mist & Fix. Depending on the event, I will set it again with the powder (see the Mud Run photo). It is easier to create designs with this than the Aqua Creams, which set quickly on their own. This palette has made a custom foundation to cover waxing bruises for a boudoir shoot, made intricate and abstract designs for fashion photography, and taken me and my running team through 10K of mud and obstacles.

SO glad I can stop buying cream bases and make custom lip colors. I also use to make less than flattering lippes work for my NC45 skin tone. Great purchase even know the ticket price hurt a little. But as they say... No pain. No Gain! LOL :-)

I went to Sephora often and I played with the makeup a lot. One of the store associates asked did I have this palette. She said all MUAs own this. I pondered getting this for a week before buying it. Once I started playing it in. I was happy that I made such an investment. I pulled off an awesome Halloween look last year with this.
i love this palette i use it as eyeshadow bases nd apply it on my lid after using urban decay primer potion.

reviews.review_title: One of my Favorite makeup products!
reviews.review_text: Great pigmentation and feels great on the face, lips and eyes. A must have!!!

This pallet is excellent. I purchased it for my kit and have gotten alot of use out of it. My suggesion for use on eyes is to put it over a good lid primer such as UDPP, and then set it with either translucent powder or eyeshadow. Otherwise, it can crease after a few hours b/c it is very creamy. I used it on eyes mostly for photoshoots, but use it for just about everything else when I do weddings including tattoo cover, color correction, and lipstick. If you are a makeup artist, it is worth the expense because a little goes a long way and the product will not go bad as long as its stored in a cool and dry place.

reviews.review_title: A MA Z I N G UNLIMITED POSSIBILITIES
reviews.review_text: I was amazingly lucky enough to find a brand new unused MUFE's 12 Flash Color Case is a box of cosmetics I traded for. I didn't realize the gem I had picked up until I started going through the box. This was definitely one of the best finds... This is an awesome item for anyone who takes her makeup seriously. There's so much versatility in this palette. It can be used everywhere - lips, cheeks, eyes...  There are two metallics in this palette, a silver and a gold. The shades are all highly pigmented and can be mixed to make almost any shade imaginable. If you're a real makeup pro, this would be amazing to own. I'm also thinking this is excellent for me, because I get bored with specific shades quickly, and using this palette to concoct my own should be extremely entertaining to me. A little of this intensely pigmented product goes a long way, so as long as it doesn't get dried or crumbly, it should last for ages. The one problem I've had so far is that it creases even with primer and powder shadow over it, but I figured out how to make the creases part of the styles. As time goes by, experience will teach me how to get the most from this. Suffice it to say, for the time being, it's certainly fun to play with.  We got to a fair amount of theme parties. I sometimes end up buying products I'll rarely use, but this palette will allow me to make some of the shades I want, on my own. The only issue I've had so far is that this definitely needs powder so that it doesn't make a mess.  (Three colors can't be used near the eyes, and three can't be used on the lips. Please make sure to read directions in order to protect yourself).  If you're truly serious about your makeup, check this out.

As a makeup artist I love having this in my kit. I can use it around halloween to do all sorts of fantasy makeup, the primary colors are great for mixing and matching you can create almost any color for any costume. The pinks and oranges are good for vibrant blush or lip colors. And the glittery gold and silver are great for a fun eye look. I will say that these have quite a slip to them, they do not dry down to a powder, they remain creamy. It is best to set these with a translucent powder, or eyeshadow if you're using them on the lid.

This pallete is amazing but please be a true pro when you choose to buy it. I love makeup and work well with it but this is all pigment and primary colors and you need to know what you're doing or look like an actual clown. But if you're a whiz with color - go for it!

luv luv luv it!!! the palette is amazing... the reason for 4 and not 5 stars is because it is not waterproof and doesnt glow in the dark... I feel that all facepaint make-up should be waterproof... if you go to creative artsy parties frequently, this palette is a must... the colors are great, very mixable, stay on all night but rub off onto other peoples faces and clothing... so watch out who u kiss and hug when scoring your gorgeous face paint... :-))

Maybe I'm not exactly sure what to do with this kit and I haven't really had time to play with it. It contains very basic colors and the only ones that are shimmery are the silver and gold, everything else is matte. I guess you can mix and match and create your own colors,

Pros: very pigmented creamy colors. Very vibrant when using it. don't even need a ton of package onto brush since its so pigmented. one swipe does the job superb!  Cons: very hard to find, very expensive in my personal opinion but for the quality of this product, price was understandable.
If your a MUA this palette is a must have, I suggest every MUA vets or in training to have this in your kit!!!!!

I'm a makeup artist in training. We use this product and I absolutely love it!!!!! Soo many uses for it! It's smooth enough for manageability and blending, the colors are super pure and to the point, and definately very little goes such a looong way!!!! It is very pricey, but when you use it you will see why!  **TO BIANCABOX: We were shown and told it will definitely crease if too much product is used. I would give this another chance and apply just a dab, it will still go a long way! :-D Good luck!  A Definite Must Have!!!!!

This is literally MY secret WEAPON. It is THE number ONE item for my makeup kit! Ive had mine since march of last year 2010, i use it EveryDay, and its still completely FULL. If you love to wear color on your eyes at ALL, you HAVE to have this. You havent lived inside the makeup world until you touch this piece of magic. BEST eye primer you will ever use!!! I use it as primer, as face and body paint, ive made foundation out of it, ive used it as mascara, as lips... Absolutely limetless. The most pigment you will ever get out of your makeup. ... MAKEUP FOREVER puts MAC to SHAME!

I was debating this or a Kryolan or Ben Nye Cream palette with 12 colors that is cheaper. But after debating, I decided to go with the MUFE palette. Im glad i did. It has so much product inside. This will literally last your whole life if you use like i do. I was a bit worried that it didnt have purple, but I found that you can create your own custom colors including a various amounts of purples and pinks and basically nearly any color of the rainbow by mixing the colors here. It is well worth it. and a little goes a long way. I use this mostly as a base to apply eyeshadow but there are millions of uses. I was thinking of collecting mac paintpots or MUFE single flash colors but this is less expensive in the long run. The colors are easy to mix and blend. The cost ends up being well worth it.

I have been trying to get my hands on this Flash palette for ages, and finally found one at MOA Sephora! I love this piece, it's one of the best additions to my make-up collection, ever. The feel of the creams is amazing, not too heavy and not too slick, the colors are rich and very blendable. There are literally endless possibilities with this. I even blended a combination to make skin tone concealer, and I'm definitely no expert. My latest craze is experimenting with one of the colors as a base under my other shadows or lipsticks. This was worth my money!
The best make up color for us to purchase. This palette is all you need, it compact and does not take long to put on makeup in the morning. Highly recommend

Fun colors that are bold and smooth but they kept creasing on my eyes and i tried everything.. the silver was good for brow high light and the coral red and magenta were great lip/cheek colors but not recommended for eyes imo

reviews.review_title: Must have for any beauty junkie
reviews.review_text: I love this pallette. On a recent trip to Asia this was one of the few beauty items I bought and I survived 3 whole weeks!

i'm an aspiring makeup artist, and i must say; saving for this may be the best sephora purchase i've ever made! Each color is amazingly pigmented and creamy, so you can use them for lips, eyes, cheeks, etc. As far as the price goes, you 100% get what you pay for. Downside is with or without a primer, if you use them alone as eyeshadow, they'll crease in no time, so definitely set them with a powder shadow!! Also, it's recommended to NOT use the salmon/coral, pink/magenta, or red colors on the eyelid, so definitely spot test before you use!! You get a ton of product for the price, and it will last a looong time. Make sure you call ahead before you drive down to your sephora, because 4 out of 5 times, they'll be sold out :< but if you buy online, you'll have no problems(:

I can completely understand why someone would be a little hesitant about purchasing this product. It certainly isn't cheap. I want to encourage anyone who is on the fence to jump off and BUY IT! If you have a passion for makeup buy this product! The uses are limitless!

when i got this, i thought the amount of each color i got was unfair. then when i used it, i realized how little i needed to cover my eyelid! i can basically touch one of the colors with the pad of my finger and it will cover my eyelid. the colors are bold and they stay that way until you remove this. i love this!

This palette is amazing, I can mix colors and just plain use them by themselves. The black is great for gel liner and the other colors mix beautiful the gold and silver are great if you need shimmer and they can be mixed to add shimmer to any color! I love this! Don't second guess yourself, Its amazing, If I were you i'd get it ;) Also, its not that expensive if your think about it its approx. 8 dollars for each color so think about a normal MUFE color is like 17 or 18 so be realistic and Enjoy!
Very intense, pigmented colors for WHATEVER look you want to do; however, it takes a fair amount of setting powder for it to stay at all.
This palette is simply amazing. It took me foreve to find it in stock which shows its popularity. A little truly goes a long, long way.

i bought this for myself for xmas cuz ive been looking for bright colors for my next photoshoot and didnt want to buy them individually. they are soo bright and beautiful! a little pricy at 94, but worth every penny!  follow me on twitter for more updates and reviews @charleymua

reviews.review_title: Be who you want to be
reviews.review_text: I love this, it allows me to do and become whatever im in the mood for, I can do the pin up look. I can be shrek, the queen of hearts. Even better, I can just carry it around and do face paint on the lil kids in my family. This stuff is really good, goes on smooth and the color is easy to blend. A little goes along way. If you know how to use it or you just want to learn. I say get it :) I loved it
Love it, you can do so much with it and its just amazing

I am not a make up artist, I don't really know color theory and color mixing, I'm not even that sophisticated at make up. But I love this palette because the possibilities are just so endless! I Just bought it and have played around with it and I'm so amazed! Although the colors are very vibrant, I found that if you blend enough, you can create subtle eye looks. If you love make up, you will love this palette.

reviews.review_title: Simple/Complex looks ... best product for the job!
reviews.review_text: By far the best bang for your $ on this site! I'm not saying don't get anything else from here but if you are serious about makeup take a color theory/application/appreciation class or heck read a book on the subject because once you get the hang of it (practice is essential), and you learn to work this medium you'll thank your lucky stars you saved & scrimped for it. Take it from an atrist and makeup junkie you will never regret this purchase.*** And remember boys & girls: Patience, knowledge, and practice required w/ this item!!***

When I first recieved this palette I was a little disappointetd because of the amount. As I started to play around with it I realized how little you need. The tiniest amount goes a LONG way! The uses for this product are absolutely endless. If you are experienced in make-up or even feel like dropping some cash on a great product this is the greatest deal around.

this is the best investment ever!!! I have had it over a year and have used it at least 50 times yet barely made a dent. I use the gold and silver almost daily as a creamy base under any metallic shadow. using a primer helps it stay all day but even without a primer it doesn't travel, it just fades a little and actually I don't ind how it fades. The colors are super intense, almost clownish, so be prepared. But you can mix ANY COLOR. It's an artist's dream. one disadvantage is the shape of the container, because its a little tricky to get just a little product on your finger if you have long nails. but since you only need literally a tiny amount of this product to cover a whole lip or eye, i usually just dip the tip of my nail into it and scrape up a tiny roll of the cream like peanut butter. I then transfer it to the back of my hand where I can mix it with other colors or apply it to my eye or lip. Also, I have to note this doesn't give you acne, doesn't smell bad (had a light scent in container but not when you put it on) and you can really var the look with how much you apply, from a very light stain to an opaque look dramatic enough for theater. Really, of all the things ive bought on sephora this and my ghd hair straightener stand out as the best purchases that I can't live without!

Couldn't be more pleased. Best $95 I've spent at Sephora. This will last you a looonng time because the color payoff is amazing! You only need the tiniest amount. The silver is by far the best silver I've ever used and the yellow and coral color are great for brightening under-eye circles before concealer. Have fun mixing and playing around too, of course! These resist water and smudging pretty well given enough time to dry, but I recommend setting with the MUFE HD powder for even more lasting power.

reviews.review_title: Must have for this make up pro!
reviews.review_text: This is a great palette! I am a professional make up and hair stylist, and this palette is a daily MUST have for me! Great color selection, and multi-use. This is my go to fix all tool!

this is a great product, and has a variety of uses. It serves as color for eyes, lips, or/and cheeks. They are meant to be mixed for custom colors or applied solely. Even though the amounts look very small, you only need a very small amount to achieve the look your going for. Each of the colors are very creamy and easy to work with, extremely pigmented and basically not for those afraid of color! On the eyes however, they do tend to crease, but on cheeks and lips they perform very well. Yes, it is quite expensive but for those who are ready to expand their makeup skills and begin experimenting, you will find this case is worth it.

Flash colors used as eyeshadow can last more than a day with primer and powder! Using LORAC behind the scenes under the flash colors and MUFE high def powder on top, I've gotten this to last over-night (sleeping), all day, another night and again the next morning. After that, it starts looking weary! The powder gives it a polished matte look and keeps it from getting on my pillow and the primer keeps it stuck to my eyes. All in all, an amazing performance!  Incidentally, the person who said that any color can be mixed from yellow, red and blue is really only right in theory. With pure colors, it's more or less possible (not including the florescents) but these aren't pure colors. The yellow is actually kind of orange, and the blue is slightly red. Surprisingly, the nearest thing to pure blue in this pallet is the turquoise color, so you'll want to use that as a mixer instead. I'm not sure what the undertone in the black is, I haven't used it much, but all blacks have one, which is why brown is often used to darken colors instead of black. No matter what color you're trying to make, start with the closest pan (e.g. for green, start w/green, for purple, start w/fuchsia, etc) and then correct it w/other colors. Good luck and have fun with this!!

I love this product. It was well worth the 98$. I use it mostly for color correcting underneath the eyes. With this color pallete you have everything you need, you can mix lip colors, create eyeshadow bases, contouring, highlighting, eyeliner, everything! I did a little reasearch before purchasing and it is a makeup artist must have!

reviews.review_title: I Luv Make Up For Ever
reviews.review_text: I couldn't have made a better purchase then when I decided to buy this pallet.
