The array of colors are spectacularly beautiful, whether you decide to wear them one at a time , or pair them a couple at a time. Either way you'll look fabulous. I would reccommend this product regardless of your age, or stature in life this investment is totally worth it.

reviews.review_title: MUFE flash color case..love it but not the price
reviews.review_text: since i received my MUFE 12 flash color case i use it pretty much every time i put my makeup on.Its a great product and it can also be used for face painting..which i have done..I highly recommend this to everyone.the flash colors i will admit look small,but once you use it you realize just how little of the product you use so it will last you awhile.. with all that said however I do feel that it is over priced $95 is ALOT of money so when i use up my case i wont be purchasing another one because of how much it is..if it dropped down to $50/60 i would prob spend that much .

It looks really little but actually since the colors are so pigmented you won't end up using a lot of product. Bottom line is...this palette is strictly for someone who understands color, how to mix color, how to de- saturate color etc in order to gain access into it's full capacity. You can experiment but it's going to take a very long time. It also gets messy and the color quad needs to be cleaned very often in order to be able use the color's full saturation. Brushes need to be cleaned constantly as well so you can really capture the color you need, unless you have about 400 brushes with you. If you understand how to control color, great this set has almost every color needed to create whatever look you want. The 3 primary colors, red, blue, and yellow when mixed to the right degree can create any color you desire and white can allow you to lighten the color to the value you desire.

These go on smoothly like a dream and stay put extremely well. My only complaint is that it instructs you not to put certain colors on the eyes or mouth. While I wouldn't really want the blue on my mouth or the red on my eyes on a daily basis, it would be fun for playing around or photo shoots. But by all means purchase this collection of long-lasting, bright colors.
VERY BEAUTIFULL COLOR TO MAKE YOUR IMAGINATION FLY AWAY.
When are they ever going to get this product back!!!? I really want to try it and its sold out online and in all the sephora stores close to me!

the colors are supe pigmented, creamy and vibrant!! I have already used the black and brown as gel liners, the magenta and peach colors for blushes, and for eyeshadow bases. There's so many possibilities!
This Make Up For Ever color case is the best ever! I love it!Bright colors and smooth. All in one box: eye shadow, highlighter, eye liner, blusher and lipstick :)

This product is just a ton of fun to work with! Adult finger-paint describes it perfectly. Even subtle make-up (which I've never understood or bothered with) is interesting with this. Bright as a clown is a possibility as well; in fact, you to do anything with this given a bit of time to mix the right color. It's also great for fixing slightly off lipstick shades. Subtle effects like highlights on the bottom lip and a slightly darker top lip are as easy as pie with the colors at hand. It is grease based makeup, so smears easily and should probably be handled with care for these prone to acne. It will probably stay very well once I get some powder/primer things (currently it smears easily and disappears within a few hours, much less if I fidget). I seriously love this and have been playing with it constantly since I bought it.  For what it's worth, it's probably not waterline safe (made my eyes itch when I tried it). Also, the no coral, fuchsia and red around the eyes and no silver, white or dark blue on the lips are US recommendations only (and is the only part of the label not in French as well).  I loved that they included fuchsia (a notoriously difficult color to mix) and the coral color is a great shortcut (it's something you would have to mix individually very often if it weren't right there on the palette). The yellow is a tiny, tiny bit orangey but can still make subtle light-lemon colors by combining it with white and a tiny bit of the aqua color. Really my only complaint is the choice of greens. It's brighter than it looks in pictures, but it is still the sort of slightly muddy green that is relatively easy to mix. I would have preferred one of the bright emerald or jade greens that are much harder to mix, especially since the bright blue contains a tiny bit of red (not enough to see, but enough to make greens muddy!) However, the aqua mixes very well with the green and after some experimentation, I got a nice bright saint- patty's day color. The gold and silver are endlessly useful/fun and the brown is a nice neutral umber color which darkens beautifully without adding undertones.  My one warning is, when buying in the store, you might want to smell it first. One of my colors (the brown) was a slight bit rancid so I'm going to exchange it one of these days.
I LOVE LOVE LOVE this. Best most fun makeup ever. I did a joker girl look on my daughter using the colors from this. It was awesome.
Now i know $95 might be alot but this product pays for it self the uses can go on forever eye base, face painting , color corrector ,contor/highlight etc.

I love LOVE LOVE this palette. It makes any color possible for lips, cheeks, eyes, even foundations... Seriously. Amazing. And a tiny bit goes a long way. Great for correctors as well. Thumbs way way up!

I got this for Christmas and starting Christmas I have worn it almost everyday somehow. The color pigment is amazing and though it does crease a little bit, its nothing a little smudging can't fix. (Everything creases on my eyes anyways so it's not big deal.) I did notice that it says you shouldn't put certain colors on your eyes or certain colors on your lips... after I used the pink on my eyes.. All in all I would definitely recommend this. The colors are amazing and go on smooth and last all day.

I'm still exploring all of the colors in this collection. They all have great pigmentation, adn work well under shadows-I've found, however, that I'm having just as much fun blending my own lipsticks and glosses with them too!  The only question I really have is-are these waterline safe? I've been tryign to keep them limited to the lashline, but I'd love to use them on the waterline too. I'd rather not risk infection though.

Amazing product! The possibilities are endless! I've used this for bases for applying blush, eyeshadows and lipsticks. I also mix them up to create custom foundations....The only problem I have is its hard to completely remove off of skin, its a bit expensive and it did make me break out a bit. Overall the quality is amazing.

Make-up Forever make my most favorite eye products. These colors are beautiful to use alone, mix together, or use as a base for a powder eyeshadow. This stays put, does not crease, even with my oily skin. I like to put it on very lightly for a hint of color for the day, & use it a little heavier, to get the high pigment for night & events. You can make any of the colors metallic by using the silver or gold ontop, or you can use the metallics as a highlight. This is a great deal, considering you can probably create every color imaginable with this palette. I highly recommend it.
This is a must have product.. it aplifies the already perfect products of Makeup forever...

I love the MUFE 12 Flash Color Case, but BEWARE ... the colors are intense! A little goes a LONG way. It's fun to mix and match to get different color variations. Sit down with clean brushes and play like a child in a watercolor set!

I really like this product, there is alot of different things you can do with it. I am still learning how to apply cream eyeshadows so I've only used it once but it turned out really good. It appears to be more like paint than eyeshadow but it I know it will last a long time, you will get your money out of it.

well I believe this product is good for a base the only problem I would say with this product is creasing but besides that I love this and I use it as a base to make all my eyeshadows stick as to the other review I didn't know we weren't supposed to use the red on the eyes? But I used it and I love this set

I was really excited about this but then I read the back after it was shipped to me, and it said not to use the red pink or coral on my eyes and not to use the blues on my lips...that means no purple on eyes or lips.  i was expecting to be able to all the colors on all parts of my face, otherwise its great
i love this product, its very useful and you can wear it all over the face
i am using it as a eyeshadow base, and I have to admit is pretty good. Although, some of the colors are very strong, so a little go a long way.
I like this product because it is very easy to use and the combo of colours look great. However it smudges very easily and doesnt stay on for long. An okay product to own specially as a professional
bright makeup = best!!

I've owned this palette for a little over 6 months and its my go to palette for shadow base colors and to mix my own corrector colors and things of that nature. Do not be fooled into thinking that the Urban Outfitters palette will offer you the same in quality and versatility. I purchased the U/O dupe to see if the quality could match that of MUFE. It was a greasy, non pigmented, low quality mess. In short, if you are looking for quality and high pigmentation don't look any further then MUFE. If you want a cheap do nothing imitation then go seek out other options. I would recommend this palette to any working MUA, or make up enthusiast.
I really wish all of the colors could be used on the eyes and lips collectively. However, the colors in this case are dynamic. it saves me money on color mixes and base colors for eye shadows.

Wow this palette is so fun to play with! I used it for Halloween, using the pink color because I needed something bright. I'm usually not very creative with bright colors but I've had fun playing with it, and have used them as eyeliners and gotten many compliments on it!

This product is awesome! The color range and the pigmentation are awesome! You can use this palette for everything; lipstick, blush, eyeshadow, etc. Makes a fantastic base for eyeshadows. A little pricey, but well worth the cost!

Pros: -Very pigmented -Easy to blend -Easy to mix -Decent amount of product -Great colors (such as primary colors that virtually enable any color to be mixed and made) -Creamy -High quality  Cons -The size, is as a previous reviewer had said about the size of a pencil box, which I too imagined it should have been larger since it is 95 dollars.

No Joke you can do anything with this palette!! You can make a foundation or concealer in your pefect shade or blend just the right colors to get any eyeshadow or lip shade imaginable. It's really simple if you just think in terms of the color wheel for new shades and there is plenty of product for endless ideas. Also it does NOT dry out quickly, the lid can in fact be left off for days without it drying out! If you like how bold the colors are without having to set them with a powder you can use a waterproof seal like eye seal by MUFE or shelaq by benefit, they are clear liquids that you brush over any type of makeup that waterproof it and prevent it from creasing and virtually moving.
love it love it love it!!!! just make sure you use a primer or it will crease but sooooooo worth it

This product is very cool and the colors are so bright and have great payoff! Definately worth the money if you are looking for theater makeup or stage makeup. The only down side is I thought it would be a lot bigger but its more like the size of a pencil case.

I would say it is the best product that I have purchased so far. The possibilities are amazing. You will have so much fun mixing colors. Use it on your lips,Checks and eyes. The price was worth it , because a little bit goes a long way. I highly recommend this product.

I bought palette this to do theatrical make-up designs for a hair show, and despiite the $95 price tag, I figured it would be a good investment for my make-up kit. The colors are very vibrant and creamy, but can tend to run and smudge a bit if not set with a fixing spray--I used M.A.C. Fix +. In the future I will use this palette as cream bases for powder shadows.
I bought this because I planned to use the colors as base. Kind of like Mac's paintpots, but I was very displeased. The colors dry up and crack, so makeup looks old and sloppy. I had to return this

I love these! they are great for bases and super blendable... but one note is that I would not consider this a novice tool in any make up kit... if you are new to cream colors PRACTICE, PRACTICE so that you dont leave your house looking a little clownish. Also the MUFE flash colors work great under M.A.C pigmentsor any othertrue pigment product which help the flash colors set... or you can simply get MUFE's diamon powder which works on EVERY skin tone even though it appears white.... but the trick is to base, apply, blend and set... I have been using this on almost ALL of my clients and love it

I walked into the Sephora at University Village and this was the first thing I saw! I immediately fell in love with it. There are an infinite amount of possibilities for this product! If you can imagine the color, you can make it. It's cream based, and highly pigmented, so a little goes a long way. Just be sure to set with a translucent powder to avoid creases.... let your imagination run free!!!

Beautiful colours, so rich and diverse. I love that you can take a little from each colour and blend together for your own signature colour.  Great for eyes, cheeks, lips.  Fabulous for something bold, like dramatic eye makeup, also can be used daily in subtler ways.  Very versatile. And a little tiny bit goes a very long way.  A bit on the expensive side, but when you consider how much product there is, and how little you need for each use, it's a great bargain. I would also like for an applicator of some sort to come with the palette or for someone to let me know which is the best delivery system i.e: brush, finger nail. tiny spatula?  I would love a tutorial on how to use this product more effectively.

This is great for all of you who love to experiment and be creative with your makeup!!! It is a great palette for mixing and getting many colors. In my opinion it is a great palette and the usage possibilities are endless...

as a professional MUA and Stylist im always lookin for the most bang for my buck. this pallette has endless possibilities. High-Fashion, A night out, Or just a day at the office, this works for them all. As with most cream products you want to set with a powder of some sort and if you have trouble applying with your finger try using a brush constructed out of synthetic fibers, i.e. Concealer brush, eyeliner brush, etc.

reviews.review_title: Highly pigmented, best cream shadow EVER
reviews.review_text: Make Up For Everu2019s cream eye shadow is like paint to me. I have always been really good at painting and blending and mixing of colors (I just canu2019t draw). To me, MUFE is a dream come true to makeup fanatics. Hereu2019s some tips for this product: A little goes a long way. Do not be afraid to blend. My favorite combination currently is the coral, red, and yellow. You can use the black as an eye liner or to add that extra darkness and give you eyes more depth on the outer corner of yours eyes (remember to go VERY light on the black). Using cream shadows, you have to apply a setting powder or else it will crease. A friend of mine uses the MUFE HD powder since it is practically translucent. I use what ever power eye shadow I want to use that day. Remember to have fun and experimentu2014itu2019s the only way to learn how to do things your way. If you have oily skin like I do, then do not be afraid to use a primer underneath. I use Too Faced Shadow Insurance primer and then I add a quick coat of Bare Essentuals Mineral Veil to even out the uneven skin tone.

I first tried the flash color in white (at a sephora location in Woodfield mall) but I had blended it with one of the power eyeshadows that Make Up Forever has. It looked absolutely gorgeous... the white made the color appear creamy. My suggestion is that you mix these (very) creamy colors with pure pigments, otherwise, you end up looking very cartoonish. Apply lightly, because again, if you apply too heavily... you look like a clown. I absolutely LOVE the silver glimmer shadow. I'm also not really sure as to what TOOL to use to apply this shadow. I tried finger, but it smudges too easily. I tried a regular eyeshadow applicator and it applied the shadow to places I didn't want it (above my lid where I wanted a lighter color) and ended up becoming a mess! Overall, I give this shadow kit a 3 out of 5 stars. It's going to last forever (only need to apply a little), but I'm not sure I'll be using it forever.

they're not as good as i would have thought, but they get the job done. I bought this so I could use it as a base to intensify my eyeshadow, but they're too watery. you can't apply too much and you have to make sure use a eyeshadow primer underneath to prevent creasing (like urban decay primer potion), and when you apply eyeshadow on top...ur eyes will look amazing. You have to play around with it and see what works for you, but once u figure it out...the results are great, and I get 12 colours in one easy palette whereas I would pay $22 for one colour You will never need to buy another one, because the portions of the eyeshadows are VERY generous (feel like i am talking about food now!) But yea, its very well worth the money. Every makeup junkie should have this in my opinion.

I like the 12 color case although the box it's little bit disappointed ( plastic made ) but the product it self unbelieveable, they are bright and pretty gorgeus and it is perfect for travelling and perfect for my skin too. I don't need to bring alot of make up, just grab this and goes on!.

I just used this for the first time today and holy doodoo! Words can't do it justice. Belongs in every makeup artist or junkie's kit. Better than kryolan and the pigmentation is ridiculous. Use with setting powder if you want to go for a more demure look or better yet, set with loose color and pigments (mac pigments and mufe work together so well!). Pricey, yes. Worth it...totally! Easily my best make up purchase of the year.
This is great product there is really a lot product the picture doesn't do it any justice.

I must say I am impressed by the amount of product. The colors are really bright. I have not used or swatched it yet, for sanity reasons. I don't really care for the packaging but it is a good idea in order to keep them clean and I wish it was more air-tight. I hope they don't dry out quick, I have never used this product before, so I hope to find ways to use it. Also the red fuchsia and coral are not to be used on the eyes, and the white silver and turquoise are not to be used for lips I believe. Other than that I would buy if I was a professional artist.The most amazing thing I bought this year.
A terrific mix of shades and so fun to work with! Much less expensive than buying the colors separately. My only wish is that it came with an attached lid or a mirror.

I love this palette!!!! To my surprise, it is a very deep palette, I thought it was gonna be the depth of a lip gloss palette and it is more like a rectangle box with LOTS AND LOTS OF PRODUCT!!!!! I don't think I will ever run out!!!! Blendable, beautiul, mixable colors! Set with powder for long lasting color!!!! :)

reviews.review_title: The one product you will ever need
reviews.review_text: I love this palette. The range of bright and beautifully pigmented creams allows you to create a diverse range of looks. Great for cheeks, lips, eyes, and base. I do advise if you are new to this product to play around at first and experiment with different tools and brushes. To use for base, you will need to mix, blend and play around until you get the colour right. I suggest loking up a colour wheel online.  To ensure long lasting wear, set product with transluscent or loose powder.  This product takes me back to art classes and unleashes your inner artist. A definite must have and the only product you will ever need. Worth every penny.
I waited for this palette to coma back in for awhile..it was worth the wait. I can use it for almost anything and it is so versatile. I highly recommend this one for any pro artist!
GREAT PALETTE! VIBRANT COLORS, GREAT SELECTION! ALL ARE MIXABLE TOGETHER. HIGH PIGMENTED, SO YOU ONLY NEED A LITTLE BIT. THE ONLY THING IS THAT I CAN'T MAKE THEM CREESE PROOF EVEN WITH A PRIMER.

I waited and waited and waited to be able to order this palette. I am soooo glad that I was patient. I LOVE IT! It's easy to use. I apply lightly for day and full out for night. I always set with a translucent powder. It just makes me smile just to see it in my make-up case everyday! It is well worth the money!

I've been a fan of the MUFE flash colors for quite sometime now... When I saw the set I ordered it right away. I do agree with some of the other comments here - if you are not familiar with this type of product you may not like it. They also give you a niceeee amount of product. I don't know if it's just me, but the Sephora picture was a little misleading. I thought the case was white but it is really clear plastic. It's not white guys! Haha

reviews.review_title: A Must Have for Pro MUAs
reviews.review_text: Purely pigmented, creamy color perfect for mixing or using straight. Much more product than expected. Sets perfectly with the MUFE HD powder!
I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT PEOPLE WHO DONT KNOW HOW TO USE IT DONOT BUY IT PLZ CAUSE THEN THAT WILL GO IN BAD REVIEWS ......ITS A GREAT PRODUCT FOR PROFESSIONALS

These are the coolest colors around! Fun fun fun!!!! Bold ,soft or dramatic,there is nothing else that compares to this product. Soft and blendable they last all day. A real must have to anyone who loves color.This far exceeds any color palate out there. I love makeup forever!!
MUFE's flash color palette is a remarkable value. I love to use flash colors as eyeliner. Getting 12 colors in one case is super convenient and a very good value.

the quantity was more than i expected in this palette...wasn't small a great decent size. I test it out last night for a party and it was long lasting alittle smudgy by the end of the night maybe i was using a little too much. Very creammy goes on smoothly. Not an everyday kind of color usage due to the vibrant bold colors. Probably would be great as base also. A value purchase for the the product!

These colors are creamy, solid, and bright! They go on very nicely for a dramatic effect. The case is almost the size of an ice cube tray, much bigger than I thought. Make Up For Ever is my favorite brand at Sephora.

I adore this palette! All of the shades are so creamy! I only put on a tiny bit or else it'll crease like no other! I still use Too Faced Shadow Insurance under just incase! I love these colors too! A+++++!!!
I love love love this palette. I would describe it as adult face paint. It so pigmented but very blendable. It's the best, I think it's very worth the money.
This is a necessity for every MUA's kit. Beyond multipurpose! Looks magnificent in photos.
This palette is so creamy and highly pigmented! I love it! It's easy to apply, and you can create any stage look with this palette! It also lasts forever~~

reviews.review_title: A must for every makeup artist!
reviews.review_text: I'm so excited about this kit! I did buy many of these colors individually, but i will still be purchasing this. They are much better than the krylon colors. They are creamier, more vibrant, more blendable and easier to apply. I love these! Make sure to set these with a powder or else they will smear.

So this just came in the mail and i am in love! the colors are bold bright and beautiful, the squares are much bigger than i expected (about 1 squares) the colors are extremely creamy and very versatile, im obsessed =)
WOW! Such bright, fun, creamy colors. Get your creative juices going! Good if you wanted to try these flash colors, now you can try almost all !!!

wow those colors are just amazing! they pop out, they are wild,crazy, and so alive it really expresses my weirdness and coes great with my clotheing designs and great for me to mae grazy prints on my eyes face lips whatever its justs o fun to play around with it is pretey hard to find all of those colors and i find it great that they give you all those viberant colors all in one! i would say if you apply it on right it is great for any season of the year go crazy,have fun!! xD luv it!!. I model too so i can just throw on some eyeshadow and look veyr creative and unique and i just snap a picutre and add it to my portfolio its great!!
